inclusion.criterion: Patient is between 18 and 80 years of old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with ICH rupture into the ventricle in the primary basal ganglia region or non-aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage confirmed by skull imaging examination
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient is admitted to hospital within 72 hours after onset
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent of the patients or their family members, and signed informed consent for CSF replacement treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: willing to join in the study
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: The project research assistant records the group and informs the specialist of the type of replacement fluid required
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has V. cholerae in stool, severe diarrhea, and low blood pressure.
